name: Genus (SAE Amsterdam)
description:
Genus 

3D Action Adventure 

Due to personal circumstances, this student could not participate with the group student game project. The student therefore got some extra time during a later stage to create the game project. This student managed to create this game, all by herself in less than 2 months.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

SAE Amsterdam Student project 2015 

2 months time 

1 game student
